extensionDescription.message: Stream YouTube Music audio to Discord

clickExtensionIcon.message: Click the extension icon in the toolbar to start streaming

failedToConnect.message: Failed to connect. Make sure the local client is running.

connectionLost.message: Connection to local client lost. Streaming stopped.

waitingModeStop.message: Someone joined the voice channel - streaming stopped (waiting mode)

audioSendingEnabled.message: Audio will be sent to Discord

clickDiscordButton.message: Click the Discord button in the player

launchClientManually.message: Please launch the Music to Discord client application manually.

streamAlreadyActive.message: Stream already active. Please try again.

controlYouTubeMusicStreaming.message: Control YouTube Music streaming to Discord
